reason: Conflicting signals from potential long-term bullish regulatory developments (South Korea Bitcoin ETF consideration) and immediate short-term institutional selling pressure (Bitcoin ETF outflows erasing recent gains) create significant uncertainty. While specific ecosystem news for Ethereum and privacy coins remains positive, Bitcoin's immediate price action faces a tug-of-war between future demand catalysts and current profit-taking. This suggests a period of high volatility and consolidation.
headlines: South Korea to flip bitcoin ETF stance as part of broader crypto push
A ruble stablecoin outpaced market leaders last year despite international sanctions
Ethereum treasury firm SharpLink stakes $170M ETH on Linea network
Bitcoin ETF optimism fades as three-day outflows streak erases early-month gains
Builders behind popular Zcash wallet Zashi to launch new startup 'cashZ'
